lead_paragraph: An Italian court has ruled in favour of Mediaset in a case involving TV soccer rights, scrapping a fine of 51.4 million euros (44.09 million pounds) imposed on the broadcaster earlier this year, a court document showed on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Italy Court Scraps Fine Against Mediaset in TV Soccer Rights Case
headline.main: Italy Court Scraps Fine Against Mediaset in TV Soccer Rights Case
